//basic introduction
If you are an experienced computer/phone user and familiar with this kind of apps, the content above will be enough for you to use this app. If not or you are interested in more details, you can continue reading the content below.
Universal Memorizing Assisstant is an app that helps you to memorize things, you can use it in many conditions that concerning memorizing, like learing a second language, memorizing answers to questions and so on. Here is some of its usage: //PIC//
The biggest difference between this app and other word/sentense-memorizing app is this app allows you to custom your reciting content completely. This may be quite useful in some specific conditions, for example:
When learing some words/sentenses of a second language that you can't easily find in a dictionary: ////// Or you just want to custom your own dictionary: ////// about the file: This app use the .xls flie as a storage to store your data to memorize (sorry that .xlsx is not supported yet), each file is called a 'book' in this app, represent a book you will memorize. You can edit your .xls file in your PC and use it in your phone, through this app, which I think is the most convenient way to make your own book and use it. ////// Of course you can also edit your book through this app: ////// A folder named U_Memorizing will be created in your phone storage in the root dictionary, and all the .xls files in this folder will be scaned as books to use. So when you have created a book file in your PC and want to use it in this app, move it into this folder. And if you want to backup your books, back up this folder.
